physDesc.p: Fragments 1-15, (1) 22 x 77 mm, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 48 x 73 mm, (A) 1 line, left bottom margins, (B) 1 line, left bottom margins, (3) 43 x 67 mm, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (4) 31 x 38 mm, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 27 x 50 mm, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 48 x 23 mm, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) traces, (7) 38 x 33 mm, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 37 x 47 mm, (A) 2 lines, bottom (?) margin, (B) blank, (9) 40 x 13 mm, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 38 x 46 mm, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (11) 64 x 44 mm, (A) 1 line, top margins, (B) traces, (12) 82 x 38 mm, (A) 5 lines, top margin, (B) 1 line, all margins, (13) 62 x 36 mm, (A) 1 line, bottom margin, (B) 3 lines, bottom margin, (14) 63 x 54 mm, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (15) 71 x 40 mm, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank
